Player History
Drafted in 22nd round, 352nd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2015, off Michael Strother (PHI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/4/2015, off Andreas McLendon (STL)...
Injured on 6/25/2015 with a Bruised Wrist, out for one week...
Traded from Cincinnati to St. Louis (C) on 4/11/2016 (Going to CIN: 3B Fede Alfaro, P Raul Freire, P William Kleist. Going to STL: LF Israel Royals, RF Steven Giunta, P Oriol Andujar)...
Signed as a free agent by San Francisco on 3/1/2017 to a minor league contract.
Signed as a free agent by New York on 4/16/2018 to a 1-year deal worth $852,000 per year...
